metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27066 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In xfrm6_tunnel_free_spi of net/ipv6/xfrm6_tunnel.c, there is a possibleuse after free due to improper locking. This could lead to local escalationof privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction isnot needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroidID: A-168043318

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
